titleStmt.title: Letter April 27, 257 BC (date of receipt)
titleStmt.author: Alexandros, cavalry commander, 9 in Pap.Lugd.Bat. XXI, p. 280

msContents.summary: Letter of Alexandros to Zenon: Menetos who assured him he would receive arrears of pay died; Alexandros agrees with Mys that a memorandum should be sent to Apollonios about the problem since he did not receive anything, and requests the intervention of Zenon

msItemStruct.note: Almost complete: line ends are missing (9 to 13 letters)
Written across the fibers with 11 lines; back along the fibers, with address and docket
Plate in P.Col. III opposite p. 44: fine hand

provenance.p: Purchased by Columbia University from Dr. Kondilios through H.I. Bell in July 1925; no.85 in Bell's inventory
